title: 1.15.1反矿透
author: Xiaoxinzhi
txt_content: 请问，在paperclip、paperspigot服务端都用不了，只能用1.15.1-spigot情况下，如何反矿透？

replies.author: Xiaoxinzhi
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-1-16 20:34
那就用插件咯
https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/anti-xray.68465/
谢谢了，回复太快了

replies.author: Xiaoxinzhi
replies.txt_content:
